评论详情: This is a multipurpose dress. Wear it to brunch or date night. The length is perfect, material stretches so you could possibly order a size down if you want a snug (curve flattering) fit. Material is not see through and it’s a good quality. I have washed it several times and the colors did not fade & it also did not shrink.
Sweet little summer dress.  Easy care.  Has POCKETS!  I'n 5'4" /120#s and it fits perfectly in that I prefer looser clothing.  Just bought a second one in a different pattern.

评论详情: This product did not look great on me. It’s definitely for younger people or someone with a tiny tiny body.

评论详情: This item comes in multiple colors and patterns. The dress is comfortable but runs on the long side. I wish it was a little bit shorter. Wash it inside out to prevent balling of the fabric.
Fit was great. Looked really nice. Perfect dress for an afternoon meeting
Too large.

The material of this dress is just not that great. The black part also appears to look worn out and washed a lot, after 1 delicate wash on cold. It looks ok on, nothing much really about. It had some loose threads. It doesn't really look like the picture.
Loved it

This dress was much cuter than I expected.  I have a large chest and a short looking waist and do not do dresses well that have elastic waists because of it.  However, this waist was in the right spot and fit me well.
Fits well, soft material, nice colors , good length. It’s a casual dress you can wear with tennis shoes during the day. Put a little jacket over it for a quick nighttime transition .
Love the dress and style. It's very comfortable but for the price I wouldn't expect it to fade and look old and worn after only one wash. I still wear it tho.
The colors are gorgeous and the length is perfect.  Very flattering and comfortable.
Nice dress
Great for pool and every day wear!
This dress came inside out, the tag was cut out of it and there are marks on it.
Sizing on point- soft fabric- pockets!! Comfortable!
Wasn't very flattering around the waist

评论概述: nice but not for pear shaped ladies
评论详情: This dress was nicer than I expected.  The fabric is synthetic but did not feel "plasticy" like some cheaper synthetics - more like a heavier t-shirt material.  Sadly, it is not made for us pear shaped ladies (smaller on top but fuller through the hips, thighs, and back side).  It pulled across the bottom but was very baggy on the top with the shoulder seams hanging a good 2 inches off my shoulders.  Would have like to have it fit but it just looked too sloppy on me.
Well made product Not too short I'm 5'1
I love this casual dress and received many compliments.

评论概述: Made smaller than stated! Poor quality
评论详情: Cut small & poor fabric

This dress is very flattering.  I got it to wear for a funeral.  I can also wear it to work.  It’s true to size.  I’m 5”2  and it’s just below the knee.  It’s like a pencil skirt effect but with a little give.  It’s not flowy. It’s  more tailored. Love it!

Very cute dress. Ordered a M and could barely get pulled down over my chest. I am 5”2’ and 118lbs. I always order size medium knowing it’ll be a hit or miss but it usually errors on the big side. This dress runs really small. Sending it back.

I like the design however the fit wasn't for me. I may need to get a smaller size which is great. The dress is lightweight and very comfortable. I think had I gotten the right size the material would've laid better. It was very breathable. The fabric is not to light that you can see thru it. I haven't washed it but based on the other one I bought there will not be a problem with shrinkage.

评论概述: I'm happy with the purchase of this dress
评论详情: a very good dress for every day in the hot summer.  length to the knee, there are internal pockets in the side seams, good length sleeves.  The drawstring belt will highlight your waist.  I am very pleased.

Perfect summer weight dress. I am 5' 4" and 164 this dress hits just at my knees. So comfortable and soft. It can be dressed up with sandals/heels or casually with a cute pair of sneakers. Highly recommend.

Bought this one size bigger so that it was a bit longer, but it's a great dress. Not at all sheer and super low effort. I like to tie the strings tight and give the top a slouchier appearance. Highly recommend!
For weekend away. Awesome quality
Great quality and super flattering! So many compliments on this comfy, adorable dress.
The quality of this dress is great for the price. The material is sturdy and comfortable. I've received quite a few compliments in this dress. Also...there are pockets!

This dress is this mom's perfect day to night or workday to weekend dress! Can easily be styled with sneakers, flats, or heels. So comfortable. I bought the navy and did not find that it was sheer at all. If there were more solid colors, I'd buy them all. I'd love to see a solid white with black or blue trim.
Very cute dress. Fit was right in point!
I wanted to love this and the material is very nice, there is just too much of it. The length was down past my knees so I returned it. I am short at 5' 3". A taller person would probably love this!

I needed a dress for a party. It is difficult for me to find a dress that fits my body type especially online. I am 5’2.5” and weight 187 lbs. My problem areas are my chest, tummy, back and upper arms. I purchased the XL size dress and it fits me perfectly! The dress on me is about calf length. The dress came really fast. I ordered on Sunday evening and I had the dress Tuesday morning. I definitely recommend it to others and will be purchasing again. Thank you!
I get so many compliments on this dress!
I had originally ordered a lg but was too big, reordered a md, fits perfectly. So comfortable, looks nice on and to top off has pockets!!!! Received multiple compliments. Ordered the navy one

评论概述: Really like the dress- bought the black with white edges
评论详情: I’m really happy with the fit of this dress. I’m 5’1 and 135 lbs and bought a medium size dress. It fits very comfortably. Light weight material, perfect size sleeves (not too short or too long), the length of the dress is attractive as well. The material doesn’t look cheap. It’s classy but a little sexy because it cinches at the waist with elastic and tie at the waist band. Recommend. 👍

I am 55 yrs old, 5’6”, 200 lbs. I bought an XL.  I don’t usually find dresses that fit well. I feel frumpy in them. But this dress…..  it is cute, comfortable and stylish. The fabric is super soft and it hangs well. The elastic waist gives it form without sacrificing comfort. And I feel like I can dress it up or down easily. It’s a win for me.

This dress is so huge. I was hoping they’d have an extra small, but I don’t think it would matter… Unless you’re very tall , this dress goes way past your knees!! I thought it was adjustable the length with the drawstrings, but it’s not. Returned immediately.
Unless you are tall, the style does’t work. Made me look dumpy.
This dress is so comfortable I love it and I look so nice in it ❤️ I will be getting another one 😁.
This dress gave me an 80's new wave vibe. Soft and very comfortable.
I love everything about ot

I have three versions of this dress in different patterns/colors. The style isn’t sexy or trendy, but it is classic, (can be) stylish, and versatile.  Two of the patterns I got are a little frumpy, but I mostly just wear them around the house, to the grocery store, etc. They are my “comfy” dresses. My favorite is the navy blue with white piping, which is about as classic as you can get. This dress looks great on its own or paired with a cardigan or jacket.  I love that I can adjust the blouson top to work with my figure. The dress flows over and camouflages my belly, and I can use the elastic waistline to make sure the hemline hits me right below my knee cap, which is the most flattering spot on me. All of the dresses get a boost by wearing them with a wide stretch belt, but they’re cute with just the drawstring as well.
I think the length is a bit ackward.  Should be shorter or a truly long maxi length dress

Lots of complements on this dress.  You can dress it up or down and it is very comfortable.  I have another one in green and white stripes.  I've worn with sandals and/or tennis shoes and it's cute no matter what.

评论概述: Fabric faded and looked worn after only 1 day
评论详情: The size and fit of the dress was perfect. However, after wearing it just once there were wear patterns on the back. I washed it according to the label and hung it up damp, not using the dryer at all. I went to get it out and realized the whole thing looks like it's been worn many times, and the coloring is extremely faded.
This dress is super cute. It's too long,  goes past the knees.  I'm 5'1 and 135lbs.
Love it!  Fabric is soft and drapes beautifully.  Perfect fit.
great
This isa gift to my daughter hopefully she likes it

I absolutely LOVE this dress. It is light and comfortable.  Prefect for the office or a casual day.  I am 5'3" so it falls just below my knees which I don't mind.  Love that it has pockets.  I get lots of compliments when I wear it.
Comfortable, vey casual

I love these types of dresses. Very casual, just slip on over head, pop on some casual shoes and off you go. I’ve ordered several of these from Amazon and will reference this review in their review. No need to repeat same statement. I assume they are durable. Very soft fabric, but not flimsy. I should have ordered a small. I’m 5,5” and 113# wasn’t sure about shrinkage so first ones I ordered were med. later orders were small. Since I just wear these for errands size isn’t a big issue for me. I suggest you order your normal size. You can’t not see through the fabric.
great little dress fits well and hides the tummy
Love the design.  The dress is too long though—kind of hits mid-knee.  I’m hoping it shrinks.
I like the dress. The fit is great and the style is cute and different. The colors are perfect. It’s a go anywhere outfits

Wore this dress today and got several Compliments on it. It was very comfortable and fit well. I often have trouble with where this type of dress sits at the waist. But this one was where it should be at my waist! Not too short or too long. I have not washed it yet so cannot speak to that yet. If it does not wash well I will Update my review. Looked good with my denim jacket with the sleeves cuffed up a little.

I love love love this dress! feel - luscious length - perfect color - vibrant even for navy flattering -  almost 100% but my tummy pops a teeny bit but I'll get over it. the other things noted in the plus column make this one a winner
Good look and fabric
Very cute and comfortable dress; work or casual weekend wear for summer!
Love the dress
Great material and fit!!! Arrived promptly, great colors just like the picture. Lots of compliments. I would order again.

This dress fits rather well. The elastic waist makes it easy to align on your body. The length is good

评论详情: I like the quality of the dress
I love the dress! Thank you.
Love this dress! Perfect for Summer!
The small is too large for my 135 pound body. I look like I’m wearing a potato sack. Not an attractive fit. The sizing is off
Stitching is horrible, colors were totally different than pictured. Very thin material. Sent it back.
Great dress for the price. Lightweight, comfortable, great for the office,will be perfect for spring/fall with a jacket and summer with sandals
Gorgeous, love the design, great price

This dress is just adorable! It’s every bit as cute as the photos. And not only that, it is made with precision and care. No loose threads. No crooked seams or fabric. AND it fits just as it is supposed to! I can’t tell you how often, when ordering clothing online, the sizing is off. But no disappointment here. It’s super cute!

My wife had me order this for her.  She normally wears a small, but based on the measurement chart, she chose a medium and that worked well.  The dress is well-made and the fabric feels nice, if just a bit on the thin side.  The "belly hiding" feature uses built-in elastic plus a drawstring so that the waist height can be adjusted.  The length also works to make it more flattering, but the straight style might make it looks less flattering on curvy body shapes.  I washes well, and though it says not to machine dry, I did do that on the low/gently cycle and it came out just fine.  Overall, this is an attractive dress and it's a very good value - I highly recommend it.

This lightweight summer dress is soft, comfortable, and stylish.  The keyhole neckline is well finished with a full binding edge.  The dress has generous pockets that will easily fit a phone.  The drawstring waist supports the weight of the pockets when full and keeps the dress in place.  The adjustable drawstring waistband is stitched without any other bulk or binding fabric, so it gathers nicely against the waist.  The dress is lightweight so a slip may be used.  This dress feels good and is super comfortable, I've already added two other prints to my list for next summer.

This is perfect for a swimsuit cover-up, or a cute dress to wear on a cruise. It's on the thinner side, and I wouldn't recommend putting it in the dryer.  It is a very soft, t-shirt-like material and comfortable.

评论概述: Cute print, looks frumpy on me
评论详情: This dress is comfortable. The fabric is a little cheap, but it's still pretty soft and easy to wear. I really like the floral print. The flowers filling up the bottom of the skirt and then becoming more sparse as you go up is classic and pretty. The drawstring at the waist is a good idea in theory, but the dress just looks frumpy on me. I'm 5'4" and wear a size 12. I ordered a size large. It might be better on someone with a different body shape. It's just not for me.

I picked this up for warm weather, when I'm going to be in a beachfront environment, and I really like it... if I think it suggests wearing it as a swimsuit coverup as it is thin/lightweight and needs a slip if worn simply as a dress (and it is attractive enough it could easily be worn as a dress to dinner), but toss it on over a swimsuit and you go from beach/swimming pool ready to restaurant ready in a heartbeat.  I love the print on the fabric, it is really attractive. The dress goes down below my knees, offering some modesty and a touch of sun protection, which is always a plus for me.

The Summer Casual Dress is a true gem, deserving a five-star rating for its exceptional comfort and flattering design. Crafted from a blend of 95% polyester and 5% spandex, it offers a soft and comfortable feel. The cute swing dress features short sleeves, a round neckline, and a stylish neck hollow out, making it perfect for summer. The elastic waistband with a movable drawstring adds a touch of versatility. Whether paired with a straw hat, denim jacket, sneakers, or sandals, this dress shines in any setting. The knee-length A-line silhouette and easy-care instructions make it a wardrobe favorite.

Whose idea was it to market this dress as a "stomach hider?" Bad idea! Some women just want more modest clothing and a truly confident woman knows what she has and doesn't have to show it all off 24/7. This is a great little dress - like a surgical scrub cross-bred with a hippie housecoat - but one need not just wear it at home. Go grocery shopping in it, walk your dog, or take a nice leisurely stroll in the park. You will turn heads in this for all the right reasons! The mandala print is eye-catching with shades of sky blue again deep orange-red tones. It's wonderfully loose and cool, but its not a shapeless shift. Sizing is generous. I am a 16 W and ordered an XXL. I could have gone a size down. That's okay however. Very happy with this.
the fabric is soft, but the white part of it is very see through, I would only wear it as a beach cover up

To be honest, I wasn't sure what to think when I first put this on, because when you cinch the drawstring, it creates a definite "blousing" effect, with the top having a bit of a poof over the waist.  I am old enough that I went through that style once and don't really want to return to it.  But it works on this dress.  It's honestly really cute.  It's also very comfortable, and my hands go into the pockets all the way up to my wrists.  Winning!

评论概述: Easy breezy summer dress, but not for frequent wear and wash.
评论详情: This dress is made of extremely lightweight knit (think of your thinnest t-shirt) and feels like wearing a nightgown or pajamas while looking much cuter and put together. It will be perfect for hot summer days. That said, I don't think it will stand up to repeated washing and I won't be drying it for fear of severe shrinkage.  This dress fits true to size, but I believe the model in the product images is wearing one or two sizes larger than her actual size--the elastic waist will cinch itself and the rest of the dress looks more flattering with a bit more volume. If you want the same look as in the pictures, size up.
Relatively lightweight but the fit is great and it looks really nice.  Slightly sheer, but not much at all, and the colors are just as vivid as they look in the picture.  Fit was perfect.

I don't really think I'd feel comfortable wearing this as a dress. It's pretty thin and just looks more like a nightgown. My skin tone bra can be seen through the white in this dress. It's not flattering on me as it doesn't have much shape. Soft material, but the dress just doesn't work for me.
This is a comfortable summer dress. It fits nicely. I love the pockets! The floral design is cute and feminine. Fabric is soft and ligntweight.
Size: Medium | Color: Coblockgreen. A nice, simple summer dress with a good cotton feel to it. What's in the original posting is what it looks like. Fit and feel and price were all good.

评论概述: Cute.  Can't go in the dryer.
评论详情: This is a cute and comfortable causal dress from Hotouch.  It is a jersey knit fabric made of 35% Viscose, 60% Polyester and 5% Spandex.  It is very comfortable to wear.  I like that it is machine washable, but I don’t like that it can’t go in the dryer.  I got a large.  For reference:  I am 5’4” tall, weigh 140 pounds and wear a 36D bra.  I usually buy a medium in bottoms and I am between a medium & large in tops (depends on brand).  The tie at the waist is a working drawstring, so you can cinch the belt as tight as you like.  The large fits me fairly well.  It maybe just slightly loose on me, but I did not want it clingy.  The hem hits just below the knee on me.  This is a cute, casual dress for summer weather.  It even has pockets!  I think it is a little fancy as a beach cover-up, but it is great for going out to lunch and traveling.

I love a soft summer sundress and have some from other Amazon sellers that I wear regularly. This one looks promising, but the hemline falls just below my knee (and the back is somehow longer than the front?) which makes it seem less fun and more frumpy. The pockets also hit right at my hips and make them look larger. The whole dress is the right size (I'm 5'6", usually wear size 8/M) except for the elastic waistband, which is too tight and ruins the comfort of the soft fabric. If I'd sized up, it would probably just look baggy. This dress is a miss for me.

This dress is kind of perfect! The material is very much like a soft t-shirt. The length is perfect for someone seeking a bit more coverage as it really does go just above the knee. My wife is 5'10" and short is usually immodestly short on her. Not this dress. It would be great for work, but also works well for travel as it can go day to evening, is cool and comfortable, but shoulders and knees are covered for visits to churches, cathedrals, etc.Darling with a pair of kids, but also great with sandals or a heeled shoe and a cardigan for something dressier. The pattern is pretty and even though it's black, it feels a little tropical. It's going to Hawaii with us later this month!
Quality materials, made well. Fits nicely.

This dress fits true to size, I’m usually a small to medium and the medium fit perfectly. The elastic waist part is not too tight so it is comfortable but tight enough to make the flounce in the front. You can also adjust the waist with the drawstring as it does go all the way around and it is a working drawstring. The bottom of the skirt has two slits up the side, not too far up, so still modest enough for the office. The material is thin and stretchy and if you’re wearing this to the office you may want to consider a slip underneath. I took one star away due to the thin fabric and also that it’s clingy in the back.  The pricing is fair for what the dress is.  I like that it’s a simple style that can be worn to work or just casually or even on vacation.
I’m about to order other prints in this same dress because I liked it so much. I’m 5’3” 180lbs It goes past my knees, is very light weight and perfect for summer. It is thin so you will need a slip.
This dress is true to size and is so comfortable and perfect for my upcoming cruise. Soft and flowy.
Nice summer dress. Fits perfectly and is beautiful

I love the colors and how comfortable this dress is. Washed it once and the colors stayed just as vibrant. I could have gone with a small (for reference I am 5'1"), the medium is loose on me but it's so pretty I'll be wearing it for sure. I'm going to see if I could shrink it some in the dryer.

This is not a particularly stylish dress, but the fabric is soft and the fit is comfortable. I don't think I will reach for it often to wear on the town, but for wear around the house or lounging, it's just right.
Cute dress,well made. Like the color combination. Washed and machine dried with no issues

I am so mad at myself. I bought the wrong size and now I don't get to be the one to wear this cute dress (I needed an XL and accidentally ordered an M). The dress has a variety of terms in the name, including swimsuit coverup which is what I would probably use this as. The material is thin and a polyester blend. I would not wear this to an event without a slip as it is very thin. As something cute to put on over a swimsuit after some time a the pool or beach it is great. There is not much shape to it. It does have decently large pockets and the drawstring tie is fully functional. I really like the pattern, I just wish it fit me.
